description: Sum, count, max, etc. across items

properties.name: fieldsToSummarize
properties.description: How to combine the values of the field you want to summarize

properties.name: fieldsToSplitBy
properties.description: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to continue if field to summarize can't be found in any items and return single empty item, owerwise an error would be thrown

options.name: continueIfFieldNotFound
options.description: Whether to continue if field to summarize can't be found in any items and return single empty item, owerwise an error would be thrown

options.name: disableDotNotation
options.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
